file_insights.primary_responsibility: Manage visual effects for combo milestones

patterns_discovered: Dynamic effect configuration based on milestone levels
Tween-based animations for text and effects
gotchas_discovered: Complex animation management requires careful tracking and cleanup
Need for flexible configuration to handle different milestone levels
Performance considerations with multiple simultaneous animations
recommendations: Consider performance profiling for high-intensity visual effects
Add configurable performance settings to scale down effects
Implement more granular event-based effect triggers
Create unit tests for edge case milestone configurations
